subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear H0me 0wner

Would you like to reduce your mortgage payment?. Your loan approval is waiting.

You can receive $248,000 for 
$678 per month.

Please respond asap.

Terrell Martiniere
Home Loan Network


It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and THEN do your best.	W. Edwards Deming
